description.cn: 该敌人无特殊能力。
description.en: This enemy has no special abilities.

description.cn: 小心它喷出的毒液，陷入其中会持续受到自然伤害。
description.en: Avoid the poisonous spit. Stepping on it will deal continuous Nature DMG to the operator.

description.cn: 他的抓取会造成大量伤害，若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员施放技能打断来解救。
description.en: His grab attack deals massive DMG. If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt him and free the grabbed operator.

description.cn: 他的蓄力二连抡斧不易闪避，尽快打断来应对。
description.en: Dodging the charged double axe swings will not be easy. Try to interrupt him instead.

description.cn: 与碾骨射手配合作战。
description.en: Fights alongside the Bonekrusher Ballista.

description.cn: 与碾骨射手配合作战。当与碾骨射手同时登场时，共同分担受到的伤害。
description.en: Fights alongside the Bonekrusher Ballista. When both are alive, they will share the DMG taken equally.

description.cn: 碾骨行刑人生命值低于50%时，会进入狂暴状态，大幅提升自身的防御力。
description.en: A Bonekrusher Executioner below 50% HP becomes frenzied and gains massive DEF.

description.cn: 能力获得强化。移动速度提升、失衡状态的持续时间减少。
description.en: Stronger abilities, faster movement, and recovers from Staggered more quickly.

description.cn:
能力获得强化。移动速度提升、失衡状态的持续时间减少。
有其他刚角天使被击败后，自身进入狂暴状态，更难被打断、不断提高攻击力并回复生命值。
description.en:
Stronger abilities, faster movement, and recovers from Staggered more quickly.
When another Heavy Ram is defeated, the Aggelos itself enters a frenzied state that makes it harder to interrupt and continuously grants it ATK and HP restoration.

description.cn: 刚角天使会靠近距离自己最近的作战设备，砸地攻击会使一定范围内的作战设备暂时失效5秒。
description.en: The Heavy Ram will approach the closest combat facility. Its ground slam attack will disable combat facilities within a certain radius for 5s.

description.cn: 会从远处攻击作战设备。
description.en: This enemy can attack combat facilities from afar.

description.cn: 会在干员脚下伸出源石柱进行攻击。
description.en: This enemy attacks by causing Originium pillars to erupt under the operators.

description.cn: 当它被靠近时，会在自身周围召唤石柱保护自己。
description.en: When approached, this enemy will summon stone pillars around itself for protection.

description.cn:
能力获得强化。
生命值低于60%时，能力获得额外强化。
description.en:
Stronger abilities.
Abilities are further enhanced when dropping below 60% HP.

description.cn:
能力获得强化。失衡状态的持续时间减少、更难被打断、攻击范围大幅提高。
生命值低于60%时，能力获得额外强化，并且每隔一段时间会免疫所有伤害，击杀全部钉刺天使α后解除免疫效果。
description.en:
Stronger abilities, faster, recovers from Staggered more quickly, is harder to interrupt, and has a greatly increased attack range.
Abilities are further enhanced when dropping below 60% HP. Also becomes immune to all forms of damage every now and then. Defeat all Sting α to eliminate this immunity buff.

description.cn: 会从更远处攻击作战设备。
description.en: This enemy can attack combat facilities from a greater distance.

description.cn: 更难被打断、无法移动并不断提高攻击力。
description.en: Immobile but harder to interrupt and continuously gains ATK.

description.cn: 会从远处攻击作战设备。
description.en: This enemy can attack combat facilities from afar.

description.cn: 拥有超远射程且威力巨大，努力躲避它的炮火才能继续前进。
description.en: This enemy has a powerful attack with extremely long range. Dodge its bombardment to progress.

description.cn: 拥有三种不同的形态。
description.en: An enemy with 3 different forms.

description.cn: 强攻形态：会不断发动凌厉的近战攻击。如果能及时打断它的蓄力，可以对其累积大量失衡值。
description.en: ASSAULT FORM: Continuously unleashes melee attacks. Interrupt the charging of its ability to apply high Stagger to it.

description.cn: 搜查形态：会召唤大量天使助战，并发动锚点冲击波。
description.en: SEARCH FORM: Summons lots of Aggeloi to the fight and unleashes Ankhor shockwaves.

description.cn: 诡计形态：会隐藏身形，从远处倾泻弹幕、进行伏击。打破其隐形的话，可以对其累积大量失衡值。
description.en: TRICKERY FORM: Enters stealth to unleash barrages of projectiles from afar or ambush your operators. Break its stealth mode to apply high Stagger to it.

description.cn: 拥有强大的远程攻击手段，能够造成灼热伤害，但移动能力较差。
description.en: This enemy has powerful ranged attacks that deal Heat DMG, but it has poor mobility.

description.cn: 会使地面喷出雾火造成灼热伤害，注意躲避。
description.en: This enemy causes hazefyre to erupt from the ground to deal Heat DMG. Try to dodge the attack.

description.cn: 被靠近时会瞬间移动到远处。
description.en: Instantly teleports somewhere far away when opponents get too close.

description.cn: 碾骨焰术师受到攻击时，会延路径向前传送一段距离。
description.en: When the Bonekrusher Pyromancer is attacked, he will teleport a short distance forward along the attack route

description.cn: 会持续朝着干员喷射火焰，尽量绕到背后来避免被波及。
description.en: This enemy can continuously spew fire at the operators. Try to move behind this enemy to avoid the flames.

description.cn: 会发射箭雨，造成持续伤害并在延迟数秒后产生爆炸。
description.en: Fires a barrage of arrows that deal DMG over time and explode after a delay of several seconds.

description.cn: 虽然端着巨大的弩，但其近战能力亦不容小觑。
description.en: Despite being armed with a giant ballista, this enemy is also a skilled melee combatant.

description.cn: 与碾骨行刑人配合作战。
description.en: Fights alongside the Bonekrusher Executioner.

description.cn: 与碾骨行刑人配合作战。当与碾骨行刑人同时登场时，共同分担受到的伤害。
description.en: Fights alongside the Bonekrusher Executioner. When both are alive, they will share the DMG taken equally.

description.cn: 非常灵活，会闪避来自干员的普通攻击。但在攻击时就无法闪避了。
description.en: A very agile enemy and capable of dodging the operators' basic attacks. However, when she attacks, she won't be able to dodge.

description.cn: 会扔出飞镖，并对被飞镖击中的干员进行追击。如果能躲开飞镖，也许是反击的好机会。
description.en: Can throw darts and perform additional attacks on operators hit by the darts. Dodging the darts might offer a good chance to counterattack.

description.cn: 会闪避来自作战设备的攻击（有冷却时间）。
description.en: This enemy can dodge the attacks of combat facilities (this skill has a cooldown).

description.cn: 灵活敏捷，但受到连续攻击时几乎不能做出任何反应。
description.en: This enemy is agile but can be overwhelmed when taking multiple hits.

description.cn: 快速奔跑直冲指挥核心，不会反击沿路的作战设备和干员。
description.en: Rushes directly at the Command Core and ignores all combat facilities and operators along the way.

description.cn: 重型敌人，利用身上的通风管将敌人牵引至自己周围并进行攻击。
description.en: A super heavy enemy. He uses ventilation pipes to pull in his opponents so that they are close enough to be attacked.

description.cn: 可以从巢雕获得能量，并提升自身的能力。小心他喷射出的火焰。
description.en: Buffs himself with the power of denstacks. Watch and evade his jets of fire.

description.cn: 苏醒后的白垩界卫可以从宇宙中召唤无数锚点砸向大地，只有躲避这些攻击，才能找到反击的机会。
description.en: The awakened Marble Aggelomoirai can summon countless Ankhors from the universe to bombard the land. Dodge these attacks to find a way to retaliate.

description.cn: 温顺的生物，较为胆小，不会主动攻击干员。
description.en: A docile and timid creature. It will not attack operators on sight.

description.cn: 拥有多种强力的砸击手段，但施放中转向较慢，是很好的绕后进攻时机。
description.en: This enemy has powerful slam attacks but rotates slowly during casting. This is the best time to go behind it and attack.

description.cn: 使用身体组合成各种形态，在战场中穿梭位移。
description.en: The enemy can reassemble its body in various forms and move quickly across the battlefield.

description.cn: 会尝试禁锢干员！迅速打断是不错的应对方案。
description.en: The enemy will attempt to trap the operators! Quick interruption will counter her.

description.cn: 比起普通牙兽更加凶猛但理智更低，若躲开它的全力扑击，它就会摔倒在地上。
description.en: Less intelligent but more ferocious than common tuskbeasts. Dodge its pounce attack to make it fall to the ground.

description.cn: 若躲开它的连续撕咬，它就会摔倒在地上。
description.en: Dodge its gnashing attack to make it fall to the ground.

description.cn: 只有击杀全部的白垩附肢，沉眠状态下的白垩界卫才会暂时露出可被攻击的核心部位。
description.en: Defeat all Marble Appendages to force the dormant Marble Aggelomoirai to temporarily expose its vulnerable core to the attack.

description.cn: 有的白垩附肢擅长攻击近距离的敌人，它们会疯狂锤击地面。
description.en: Some Marble Appendages are skilled at attacking melee opponents with powerful slams.

description.cn: 有的白垩附肢擅长攻击远距离的敌人，它们把自己的末端碎裂为侵蚀，抛射向敌人。
description.en: Some Marble Appendages are skilled at attacking ranged opponents by converting their tips into Blight material that can be thrown.

description.cn: 攻击范围大幅提高。
description.en: Greatly increased attack range.

description.cn: 更难被打断、无法移动并不断提高攻击力。
description.en: Immobile but harder to interrupt and continuously gains ATK.

description.cn: 灵活敏捷，但受到连续攻击时几乎不能做出任何反应。
description.en: This enemy is agile but can be overwhelmed when taking multiple hits.

description.cn: 他的抓取会造成大量伤害，若有干员被他抓住，可尽快用其他干员施放技能打断来解救。
description.en: His grab attack deals massive DMG. If an operator is grabbed, use another operator's skill to interrupt him and free the grabbed operator.

description.cn: 他的蓄力二连抡斧不易闪避，尽快打断来应对。
description.en: Dodging the charged double axe swings will not be easy. Try to interrupt him instead.

description.cn: 会在干员脚下伸出源石柱进行攻击。
description.en: This enemy attacks by causing Originium pillars to erupt under the operators.

description.cn: 当它被靠近时，会在自身周围召唤石柱保护自己。
description.en: When approached, this enemy will summon stone pillars around itself for protection.

description.cn: 愤怒的斧甲兽会把一切闯入领地的敌人用巨角驱赶出去，一定要小心它的冲撞。
description.en: A raging Axe Armorbeast will use its massive horns to chase out enemies intruding its territories. Watch out for its ramming charge.

description.cn: 会进行各种大范围的攻击，在它愤怒时及时打断。
description.en: The enemy will perform various large area attacks. Interrupt it when it becomes enraged.

description.cn: 斧甲兽周围存在敌方单位时，会释放技能加强周围敌方单位，大幅度提升它们的速度和防御力，并使其更加难以被打断。
description.en: When the Axe Armorbeast has nearby allies, it will cast a buffing skill that greatly increases their speed and DEF, making them harder to interrupt.

description.cn: 通常成群结队出现，小心它们锋利的前肢。
description.en: An enemy that shows up in groups. Watch out for their razor sharp forward appendages.

description.cn: 胆小的它们会缩进壳中保护自己，向四周无脑发射身上的源石来吓走敌人。
description.en: A timid enemy that retreats into its shell to protect itself. It will also mindlessly fire Originium crystals from its body to intimidate its opponents.

description.cn: 酸液源石虫受到攻击时，会蜷缩自身，降低接下来受到的伤害并持续恢复生命值，持续10秒。
description.en: When the Acid Originium Slug is attacked, it will curl up to reduce DMG taken and continuously restore its HP for 10s.

description.cn: 除非他正在发动进攻，否则他会格挡所有来袭的攻击。使他失衡即可击碎他的盾牌。
description.en: This enemy will block all incoming attacks unless he is attacking. Stagger him to shatter his shield.

description.cn: 碾骨先锋首次受到攻击时，会举起盾牌，大幅度降低受到的伤害，盾牌在受击后破碎。
description.en: When the Bonekrusher Vanguard is attacked, he will raise his shield to greatly reduce DMG taken. The shield shatters upon hit.

description.cn: 进攻连绵不绝。即使截断他的攻势，他也仍有可能再次发动攻击。
description.en: A relentless enemy. Even after being interrupted, he is likely going to try attacking again.

description.cn: 会在地面布撒臂甲上的爆反装甲碎片，如果不慎踩到需要立刻离开。
description.en: This enemy uses his armored sleeve to scatter reactive armor scales. Keep a safe distance, especially when accidentally stepping on it.

description.cn: 会尝试回收地面上的装甲碎片重整旗鼓，若成功回收会发动强大的攻击。
description.en: This enemy will try to retrieve armor scales from the ground to get back to form, and will launch a powerful attack upon successful retrieval.

description.cn: 施放的小型旋风会同时减速干员。
description.en: Launches small whirlwinds that can also slow down operators.

description.cn: 跂步晶城拥有通常和架盾两种形态。
description.en: The Walking Chrysopolis has two states: Normal and Bastion.

description.cn: 通常状态：拥有把远处干员拉拽到面前的能力。
description.en: Normal State: This has the ability to pull in operators from afar.

description.cn: 架盾状态：正面和侧面会反弹攻击，同时暴露背后的弱点。
description.en: Bastion State: All incoming attacks on its front or sides will be reflected, but this also exposes a weak point on its back.

description.cn: 能力获得强化。弱点暴露时间减少，弱点暴露结束时未被破坏会大幅提高自身攻击力，弱点被破坏会进入失衡状态。
description.en: Stronger abilities, recovers from weakpoint exposures more quickly, gains a massive ATK buff if weakpoint is not destroyed when exposure ends, but becomes Staggered when the weakpoint is destroyed during exposure.

description.cn: 身形灵活，利用爪子和尾巴进行攻击，注意躲避
description.en: An agile beast that attacks with its claws and tail. Try to dodge.

description.cn: 愤怒状态：愤怒状态下攻击力提升，蓄力频率更高。失衡后结束愤怒状态。
description.en: Enraged State: When enraged, the beast has increased ATK and uses its charge up skills more often. Applying Staggered to it ends the enraged state.

description.cn: 会发射各种箭矢和投掷炸弹进行远程牵制攻击
description.en: Fires all sorts of arrows and throws bombs to harass their opponents from range.

description.cn: 会从远处快速接近，攻击命中时对干员施加寒冷附着。
description.en: This enemy can quickly close the distance from afar. Its attacks can apply Cryo Infliction to operators upon hit.

description.cn: 发射的子弹命中时会对干员施加寒冷附着。
description.en: The projectiles it launches apply Cryo Infliction to operators upon hit.

description.cn: 会大幅强化周围的同伴，使它们的能力提升。
description.en: This enemy can greatly strengthen nearby allies to improve their capabilities.

description.cn: 拥有远程和近战两种状态。
description.en: The enemy has two states: Ranged and Melee.

description.cn: 近战状态：靠近目标进行近身缠斗。
description.en: Melee State: In this state, the enemy will try to approach the target to unleash melee attacks.

description.cn: 远程状态：保持距离战斗并使用更强的能力进行攻击。
description.en: Ranged State: In this state, the enemy will maintain its distance and attack with more powerful abilities.

description.cn: 远程状态下受到更多灼热伤害，但受到其他类型的伤害显著减少。
description.en: The ranged state suffers more Heat DMG, but has significant DMG Reduction against other elements.

description.cn: 每隔一段时间，破潮之像会在路径上制造一个特殊区域，其他敌方单位在该区域上移动时会大幅提升速度和防御力，并更加难以被打断。
description.en: The Tidalklast regularly creates special zones along its path. Its allies in these zones gain greatly increased speed and DEF, and become harder to interrupt.

description.cn: 会使用带寒冷附着的能力进行攻击，在攻击命中时冻结干员。
description.en: Attacks with abilities that apply Cryo Infliction, and applies Solidification to operators it hits.

description.cn: 在生命值较低时会自爆。自爆会在被命中干员身上留下不稳定化合物，干员再次受到伤害时，这些化合物会爆炸。
description.en: This enemy detonates self at low HP. The detonation applies an unstable material on the operator it hits. If the operator takes DMG, the material will explode.

description.cn: 火雾源石虫在死亡时会回复周围同伴的生命值。
description.en: When killed, the Firemist Originium Slug restores the HP of its nearby allies.

description.cn: 蓄力充气时打断，可以把正在继续的气体打出，对其累积大量失衡值。
description.en: Interrupt the enemy when it charges up and inflates itself to deflate it quickly and apply large amounts of Stagger.

description.cn: 愤怒状态：愤怒状态下攻击力提升，蓄力频率更高。失衡后结束愤怒状态。
description.en: Enraged State: When enraged, the beast has increased ATK and uses its charge up skills more often. Applying Staggered to it ends the enraged state.

description.cn: 球刺兽蜷缩起身体，以更快的速度行进。
description.en: The quillbeast can curl itself up into a ball to move faster.

description.cn: 从头部喷出积蓄的酸液，命中干员后会减少防御力，虽然看起来威胁不足但仍需小心。
description.en: An enemy that spews acids stored in its head. Operators hit by this attack will suffer reduced DEF. Though not very threatening, care should be taken in any case.

description.cn: 愤怒的斧甲兽会把一切闯入领地的敌人用巨角驱赶出去，一定要小心它的冲撞。
description.en: A raging Axe Armorbeast will use its massive horns to chase out enemies intruding its territories. Watch out for its ramming charge.

description.cn: 会进行各种大范围的攻击，在它愤怒时及时打断。
description.en: The enemy will perform various large area attacks. Interrupt it when it becomes enraged.

description.cn: 通常成群结队出现，小心它们锋利的前肢。
description.en: An enemy that shows up in groups. Watch out for their razor sharp forward appendages.

description.cn: 胆小的它们会缩进壳中保护自己，向四周无脑发射身上的源石来吓走敌人。
description.en: A timid enemy that retreats into its shell to protect itself. It will also mindlessly fire Originium crystals from its body to intimidate its opponents.

description.cn: 相比普通彪兽，在生命值较低时会短暂隐匿并蓄力，及时打断可以使它脱离隐匿，并对其累积大量失衡值。
description.en: When compared to common rakerbeasts, this enemy will enter temporary stealth and charge up its skills at low HP. Interrupt it quickly to end its stealth and deal massive Stagger to it.

description.cn: 愤怒状态：愤怒状态下攻击力提升，蓄力频率更高。失衡后结束愤怒状态。
description.en: Enraged State: When enraged, the beast has increased ATK and uses its charge up skills more often. Applying Staggered to it ends the enraged state.

description.cn: 会蓄力鼓起肚皮，喷出体内的高热量熔岩，在蓄力时打断可对其累积大量失衡值。
description.en: This enemy will charge up and inflate its abdomen to spew superhot lava from its body. Interrupt it during charge up to deal massive Stagger to it.

description.cn: 愤怒状态：愤怒状态下攻击力提升，蓄力频率更高。失衡后结束愤怒状态。
description.en: Enraged State: When enraged, the beast has increased ATK and uses its charge up skills more often. Applying Staggered to it ends the enraged state.
